page.title: 03MOSS
page.content: In{Moss}there are some old people's bungalows. They are modern and the gardens and lawns are very nice. The {brickworks}closed down in the 1900's. The last bricks that were made were for the front of Doncaster Station. The{Star Inn}(Pub) has been in the same family for about 200 years. At the back there is a small adventure playground for the children. Sometimes this pub is the meeting place for{The {Hunt}before they start their run. The railway is the main Edinburgh to London line. It is quite busy. There used to be a school in{Moss}but it closed down in 1978. Also there used to be a church but one was built in Fenwick and the one in Moss closed down in the early 1980's. The roads in Moss are very quiet but sometimes when bridges close down they become quite busy.
